articles.title: PSB privatisation: Can government outfox India’s powerful trade unions? - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Reversing bank nationalisation is a politically sensitive step. But, the government seems to have a plan this time.
articles.content: Fifty-one years after bank nationalisation, the Centre has finally decided to kick off the privatisation of public sector banks (PSBs). The government owns more than a 70 percent stake in 10 of these… [+7427 chars]

articles.author: ET Auto
articles.title: Ashok Leyland begins bus production at Vijayawada plant - ETAuto.com
articles.description: Located 40 km away from Vijayawada, this plant spread over 75 acres has the latest technologies to deliver the high quality standards of the Ashok Leyland brand. It has the capacity to produce 4800 buses a year.

articles.title: 'All Pieces in Place': WHO Gives AstraZeneca Covid-19 Vaccine Approval For Emergency Use - News18
